name: 2015 International Conference on Mechanical and Aeronautical Engineering
content: ICMAE 2015 will be hosted at Quality Hotel Marlow. The submission deadline is Oct. 30\. All the papers accepted by ICMAE 2015 will be published in AMM journal. Excellent papers with extension can be recommended to publish in Jurnal Teknologi, indexed by Scopus. Keynote Speakers: 1,Professor Matthew Parkinson,Pennsylvania State University, USA 2,Prof. Xiaoping Du, Missouri University of Science and Technology,USA 3,Prof. Christopher Y H CHAO,Hong Kong University of Science and Technology 4, Prof. WONG Chee How, Nanyang Technology University, Singapore
